articles.title: Miami Heat’s fourth-quarter rally upsets Denver Nuggets in NBA finals Game 2 - The Guardian
articles.description: Gabe Vincent scored 23 points, Jimmy Butler and Bam Adebayo each had 21 and the Heat evened up the finals by overcoming a monster effort from Nikola Jokic
articles.content: Gabe Vincent scored 23 points, Jimmy Butler and Bam Adebayo each had 21 and the Miami Heat evened up the NBA finals by overcoming a monster effort from Nikola Jokic to beat the Denver Nuggets 111-108… [+4343 chars]
